title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Emotion-Based Learning Design for Acquiring Sports Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more emotional constraints affecting sports expertise development
Achieve over 80% competency in decision-making under simulated emotional pressure resembling actual game environments
Design personalized coaching strategies by analyzing team members' individualized emotional response patterns

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
